bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I make honey!
🐝 I have black and yellow stripes.
🌸 I love to collect nectar.

bug.question: I crawl on the ground and carry things that are much bigger than me. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.
🐜 I live in a colony with many others.
🍪 I like to eat crumbs of food.

bug.question: I am red with black spots and I am considered lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 Farmers like me.
🌱 I eat other small bugs that harm plants.
🔴 I am often found in gardens.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I have very strong legs.
🟢 I am usually green.
🎶 You often hear me in the summer.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then turn into something beautiful with wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I fly around flowers.
🐛 I go into a chrysalis.
🎨 I have colorful wings.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs.
🕷️ People are often scared of me.
🪰 Flies get stuck in my home.

bug.question: I light up at night, and people like to catch me in jars. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 My light is called bioluminescence.
🌙 I am most active at night.
✨ I can be found in grassy fields.

bug.question: I have a long body and many, many legs. What am I?

hints.text: 💯 I have more than 20 legs!
🐛 I live in damp places.
🪴 You can find me under rocks and logs.

bug.question: I can walk on water. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm also called a water strider.
⛸️ My feet are water repellent.
🐟 I eat smaller bugs that fall into the water.

bug.question: I make a loud noise by rubbing my wings together. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am heard during the hottest part of the summer.
🌳 I spend most of my life underground as a nymph.
🎶 Only the males sing.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright and give light to the Earth during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
☀️ I appear in the sky every morning
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me

cosmos.question: I shine at night, but I don't have my own light. I reflect the Sun's light. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Sometimes you can see me in the daytime.
🌚 I have different shapes, like a crescent or a full circle
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I am a shiny point of light far, far away. I am much bigger than Earth! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night sky.
🌌 There are many of me.
🔭 You can sometimes see me better with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock, liquid and gas that goes around the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 You live on me!
🛰️ I have other planets around me.
🔄 I spin around and around.

cosmos.question: I am a huge group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I have a spiral shape!
🥛 Our Sun is part of a very big one.
🌌 There are billions of me in the Universe.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that seem to form a picture or pattern in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 One of me is a big bear.
✨ I am made of stars!
📜 Ancient people used me to tell stories.

cosmos.question: I am the hottest planet in our solar system, even though I am not the closest to the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am named after a Roman goddess of love.
💨 I have a very thick atmosphere.
🌡️ My surface is hot enough to melt lead.

cosmos.question: I am known as the red planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I share my name with a candy bar!
🚀 People might visit me one day.
🔴 I am known for my rusty color.

cosmos.question: I am the largest planet in our solar system, and I have a giant red spot! What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ The spot is a big storm.
🪐 I have many moons.
💨 I am a gas giant.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice, rock and dust that sometimes comes close to the Sun, and I grow a tail. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am sometimes called a 'dirty snowball'.
🔭 My tail always points away from the Sun.
🥶 I come from the outer edges of our solar system.
